member.name: M:FordEscape.GetAutoPark
member.summary: Gets the auto park state. Disabled: 0x00. Reduce Speed: 0x02. Searching: 0x04. Pull Forward: 0x08

member.name: M:FordEscape.GetCurrGear
member.summary: Gets the current gear of the car. Park: 0x10. Reverse: 0x30. Neutral: 0x50. Drive: 0x70. Low: 0xC0

member.name: M:FordEscape.GetSteeringAngle
member.summary: Gets the steering wheel angle. Range: 0x25C3 (counter clockwise) - 0x7661 (clockwise) [0x4D00 is centered]

member.name: M:FordEscape.GetGasPedalAngle
member.summary: Gets the current gas pedal angle. Un-depressed: 00. Fully-depressed: 0x20

member.name: M:FordEscape.GetBrakeState
member.summary: Get the current brake state. Engaged: 0x01. Dis-Engaged: 0x00

member.name: M:FordEscape.GetRPM
member.summary: Gets the current RPM of the internal combustion engine

member.name: M:FordEscape.GetSpeed
member.summary: Gets the current speed in MPH

member.name: M:ToyotaPrius.SetSteeringAngle(System.Int16,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Sets the steering wheel angle. Range: 0x157 (counter clockwise) - 0xEA9 (clockwise) [0x0000 is centered]

member.name: M:ToyotaPrius.SetSpeed(System.UInt16,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Sets the current speed in MPH

member.name: M:ToyotaPrius.SetRPM(System.UInt16,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Sets the current speed in KPH

member.name: M:ToyotaPrius.SetAutoBrake(System.UInt16,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Sets the brake pressure for the auto braking capability. Range 0xE000-0x0000 [Most-to-Least]

member.name: M:ToyotaPrius.GetAutoBrake
member.summary: Gets the brake pressure for the auto braking capability. Range 0xE000-0x0000 [Most-to-Least]

member.name: M:ToyotaPrius.GetAutoPark
member.summary: Gets the auto park state. Enabled: 0x30. Disabled: 0x10

member.name: M:ToyotaPrius.GetCurrGear
member.summary: Gets the current gear of the car. Park: 0x00. Reverse: 0x10. Neutral: 0x20. Drive: 0x30. Engine Brake: 0x40

member.name: M:ToyotaPrius.GetSteeringAngle
member.summary: Gets the steering wheel angle. Range: 0x157 (counter clockwise) - 0xEA9 (clockwise) [0x0000 is centered]

member.name: M:ToyotaPrius.GetGasPedalAngle
member.summary: Gets the current gas pedal angle. Un-depressed: 00. Fully-depressed: 0xC8

member.name: M:ToyotaPrius.GetBrakeState
member.summary: Get the current brake state. Engaged: 0x04. Locked: 0x0A. Dis-Engaged: 0x00

member.name: M:ToyotaPrius.GetRPM
member.summary: Gets the current RPM of the internal combustion engine

member.name: M:ToyotaPrius.GetSpeed
member.summary: Gets the current speed in MPH

member.summary: A function that will add the byte-rounded checksum at the last slot in the sff->data[] array
